heroText.subtitle: web developer Jr
heroText.description: I am dedicated to creating comprehensive solutions, from design, development to deployment, my approach covers the different stages of web development, offering complete and efficient solutions

designCard.title: WEB DESIGN
designCard.description: I seek to create attractive and functional visual experiences. implementing responsive, intuitive and aesthetic designs that effectively reflect the identity of each brand

frontendCard.title: FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT
frontendCard.description: I bring creative designs to clean and efficient code, using the latest development technologies and best practices. Ensuring compatibility with multiple devices and browsers.

backendCard.title: BACKEND DEVELOPMENT
backendCard.description: I am responsible for creating robust and functional systems that support the business logic of web applications. From the implementation of APIs to database management.
